item.content:encoded: Love is in the air and life is better with you by my side! We look forward to our journey through life together. At this time we would appreciate privacy for all those close to our hearts.
item.author: Tiger Woods

item.content:encoded: One thing LLMs make you realize is how poorly many math books are written. Literally just asking the LLM for what a theorem does tells you more than many math books. So... why couldn't the author just do that?

item.author: modest proposal

item.content:encoded:
Algorithmic newsfeeds created a filter bubble that tore at the fabric of society and increased partisanship
Now, because of AI, the marginal cost of creating hyper-targeted propaganda is going to zero. Delivered to your personal newsfeed
We are in for a very bad time

item.content:encoded: Surprising to both non-Americans & Americans: US universities (esp for domestic students) have been getting cheaper. Harvard, MIT, Caltech, Penn now free if family income <200k. Avg tuition and fees net of aid at US public schools 36% lower, at privates 9% lower, than 20 yrs ago.
